ShinyLemonPie 0.0.0.1
  • Reference

    Set up a Shiny app to use tarteaucitron

    useShinyLemonPie.Rd

    This function must be called from a Shiny app's UI in order for all other ShinyLemonPie functions to work. You can call useShinyLemonPie() from anywhere inside the UI, as long as the final app UI contains the result of useShinyLemonPie()

    useShinyLemonPie(
  lang = "cn",
  orientation = "bottom",
  showAlertSmall = FALSE,
  cookieslist = FALSE,
  closePopup = FALSE,
  showIcon = TRUE,
  iconPosition = "BottomRight",
  iconSrc = "",
  DenyAllCta = TRUE,
  AcceptAllCta = TRUE,
  highPrivacy = TRUE,
  removeCredit = FALSE,
  moreInfoLink = TRUE,
  groupServices = FALSE,
  handleBrowserDNTRequest = FALSE,
  adblocker = FALSE,
  mandatory = TRUE,
  mandatoryCta = TRUE,
  hashtag = "#tarteaucitron",
  cookieName = "tarteaucitron",
  serviceDefaultState = "wait",
  privacyUrl = "",
  bodyPosition = "top",
  cookieDomain = "",
  readmoreLink = "",
  useExternalCss = FALSE,
  useExternalJs = FALSE,
  useBS5Css = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    lang

    Language attribute for the ShinyLemonPie input. Available values are "ar","bg", "ca", "cn","cs", "da", "de", "el", "en", "es", "et", "fi", "fr", "hu", "it", "ja", "lt", "lv", "nl", "no", "oc, "pl", "pt", "ro", "ru", "se", "sk", "sv", "tr", "uk", "vi", "zh" for Arabic, Bulgarian, Catalan, Chinese, Czech, Danish, German, Greek, English, Spanish, Estonian, Finnish, French, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Lithuanian, Latvian, Dutch, Norwegian, Occitan, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian & Moldavian, Russian, Northern Sami, Slovak, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese and Chinese respectively.

    orientation

    Banner position (top, bottom and middle)

    showAlertSmall

    logical. Show the small banner on bottom right (FALSE or TRUE)

    cookieslist

    logical. Show the cookie list (FALSE or TRUE)

    closePopup

    logical. Show a close X on the banner (FALSE or TRUE)

    showIcon

    Show cookie icon to manage cookies

    iconPosition

    Icon position (BottomRight, BottomLeft, TopRight and TopLeft)

    iconSrc

    Optional: path for icon image

    DenyAllCta

    logical. Show the deny all button (FALSE or TRUE)

    AcceptAllCta

    logical. Show the accept all button when highPrivacy is TRUE (FALSE or TRUE)

    highPrivacy

    logical. HIGHLY RECOMMANDED Disable auto consent (FALSE or TRUE)

    removeCredit

    logical. Remove credit link (FALSE or TRUE)

    moreInfoLink

    logical. Show more info link (FALSE or TRUE)

    groupServices

    logical. Group services by category (FALSE or TRUE)

    handleBrowserDNTRequest

    logical. If Do Not Track == 1, disallow all (FALSE or TRUE)

    adblocker

    logical. Show a Warning if an adblocker is detected (FALSE or TRUE)

    mandatory

    logical. Show a message about mandatory cookies (FALSE or TRUE)

    mandatoryCta

    logical. Show the disabled accept button when mandatory on (FALSE or TRUE)

    hashtag

    Open the panel with this hashtag (default : #tarteaucitron)

    cookieName

    Cookie name (default : "tarteaucitron")

    serviceDefaultState

    Default state (true, wait or false)

    privacyUrl

    Privacy policy url

    bodyPosition

    bottom or top to bring it as first element for accessibility

    cookieDomain

    Shared cookie for multisite ex : .my-multisite-domaine.fr

    readmoreLink

    Change the default read more link

    useExternalCss

    logical. If false, the tarteaucitron.css file will be loaded

    useExternalJs

    logical. If false, the tarteaucitron.js file will be loaded

    useBS5Css

    logical. If true, a css theme compatible with BS5 is loaded.

    Value

    Scripts that ShinyLemonPie requires that are automatically inserted to the app head tag. A side effect of calling this function is that a ShinyLemonPie directory is added as a resource path using shiny::addResourcePath().

    Examples

    useShinyLemonPie(
  lang = "en",
  orientation = "bottom",
  showAlertSmall = FALSE,
  cookieslist = FALSE,
  closePopup = FALSE,
  showIcon = TRUE,
  iconPosition = "BottomRight",
  iconSrc = "",
  DenyAllCta = TRUE,
  AcceptAllCta = TRUE,
  highPrivacy = TRUE,
  removeCredit = FALSE,
  moreInfoLink = TRUE,
  groupServices = FALSE,
  handleBrowserDNTRequest = FALSE,
  adblocker = FALSE,
  mandatory = TRUE,
  mandatoryCta = TRUE,
  hashtag = "#tarteaucitron",
  cookieName = "tarteaucitron",
  serviceDefaultState = "wait",
  privacyUrl = "",
  bodyPosition = "top",
  cookieDomain = "",
  readmoreLink = "",
  useExternalCss = FALSE,
  useExternalJs = FALSE,
  useBS5Css = FALSE
)
#>
